name: lime, from liquid packaging board production to generic market for soil pH raising agent | soil pH raising agent, as CaCO3 | Cutoff, U
description:
ecoQuery: https://ecoquery.ecoinvent.org/3.10/cutoff/dataset/26948/documentation

This is a renaming activity. Its purpose is to link 'lime, from liquid packaging board production' to the 'generic market for soil pH raising agent'. All products that enter this generic market provide the function of pH soil raising agent.

Activity starts with the reception of 'lime, from liquid packaging board production'.

Activity ends with the 'soil pH raising agent, as CaCO3' being ready for transportation.
category: C:Manufacturing/20:Manufacture of chemicals and chemical products/201:Manufacture of basic chemicals, fertilizers and nitrogen compounds, plastics/2012:Manufacture of fertilizers and nitrogen compounds
